snippet.title: The Snowboard Game
snippet.description:
This is a reupload of the trailer with a few small logo changes.

The snowboard game is a realistic skill based snowboard game with natural physics set in multiple immersive mountain locations and snow parks.

Create your own snowboard career in story mode where you meet other enthusiasts and pro boarders that will challenge you to learn new tricks or just get down the mountain. Complete missions, compete in online events or player created challenges to earn money, fans and equipment.

Multiplayer
Compete with other people from all over the world. If you find a spot you like, you can create a session to build jumps and place props to create a video and upload to your fictional video channel. A challenge is time or score based and can be found by anyone close to your online ranking.

Mountains
Right now there are five fictional handcrafted mountains in three different moutain areas. Each mountain has short single player missions, a few online events and endless usercreated challenges.
The focus of development has been to create natural and immersive physics while still being fun with tight and responsive controls.

Visit the steam page
http://store.steampowered.com/app/803830/The_Snowboard_Game/
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/thesnowboardgame/
